reviews.text: I don't know if all the rooms have been updated, but the last two times I stayed there I got completely renovated rooms which were quite comfortable. I was very pleased with my stay. I usually order room service there and it is always speedy and consistent in terms of food quality. The employees are generally friendly. The hotel offers shuttle service and the driver is very helpful. Good hotel and I would recommend to business travelers.
reviews.title: Updated rooms make this once tired hotel a nice stay! Great location too. Good value for business travel!!!

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel for two nights. The staff was friendly and extremely helpful. Although a bit older hotel, this one is very well kept and updated. The rooms although a bit small, had all new furniture and a complete recent remodel. Didn't find one thing to complain about. The kids loved the indoor/outdoor pool. Very centrally located in Omaha. Good dining within walking distance. A Whole Foods also within walking distance. All The positives: Great Staff, Newly remodeled, Comfy beds, Great facilities, great central location. Negatives: None
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: My Family and I had the opportunity to stay at the Omaha Marriott March of 2012. We are from the Omaha area and thought we knew what to expect by visiting this local Marriott. We were blown away by our experience at the Marriott. From the moment we arrived until we left the staff was wonderful. Check in was excellent we were greeted warmly by the staff from the minute we walked in the door. Our room was clean and nicely appointed. I cannot say enough about the Chophouse. We were always under the impression that the restaurant was expensive we were blown away by the amazing appetizers and the prices that were in the $6.00-$7.00 range. Try the Portobello French fries AMAZING. The pool area is indoor/outdoor swimming even in the winter excellent atmosphere. The gym area has a lot of really nice equipment and is well thought out. What a great mini get away within my own city hidden gem that I really would never think about!!!! Thank you
reviews.title: Great Experience

reviews.text: I was able to Priceline a room for an amazing price! Check in was a breeze with fast and friendly service. Our room was nice, maybe a little small though, with flat screen tv and mini fridge. We really loved the indoor-outdoor heated pool and the hot tub was perfect. Best ever breakfast buffet on site at The Chophouse restaurant. This hotel is close to Omaha shopping, fine dining, and entertainment. Will stay here again.
reviews.title: Love location and pool here!

reviews.text: Typical Marriott set-up, but cleaner than many. Plenty of equipment in fitness center and it all works, which is not always typical. Very pleasant staff, but had to wait a few minutes for someone to come out of the back to help me in the restaurant. Try some of the local dishes.
reviews.title: Solid Marriott

reviews.text: We paid $99 a night as part of an event celebration, and we were given complimentary breakfast buffet passes at check-in. The buffet is many steps above what you might get a typical free breakfast--there was a waffle and omelette station (manned), plenty of fresh cut fruit, yogurt, homemade granola and a wide variety of hot foods and pastries.
reviews.title: Heavenly beds, friendly staff

reviews.text: Our room was on the small side, but fairly quiet. The view was of the parking lot, but the beds were SO comfortable. Shower was hot and had good water pressure and the bathroom was well stocked with Bath & Body Works amenities and large, absorbent towels.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay and a great price!

reviews.text: The front desk was very helpful and I never had to wait to ask a question, get a replacement room key or check in/out. This in spite of the fact that the hotel was at capacity two of the nights we were there!
reviews.title: A nice get away

reviews.text: The pool is large and nicely heated (and even extends outside), but it was overrun with loud kids and their screaming echoes off the walls and ceiling to create quite a racket. We avoided the hot tub as it has filled with a large group of children--including one in diapers (ick).
reviews.title: Solid business hotel

reviews.text: My business team travel frequently to cities all over the US. We were pleasantly surprised to find this gem of a Marriott. Lovely setting, in a suburban shopping area next to Whole Foods. Have paid twice the $139 per night rate for less quality. Staff were the friendliest and most helpful we've encountered in ages. Restaurant and room service excellent! Will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Older Marriott but not bad

reviews.text: Spent a weekend here attending the Association Of Zoos & Aquariums Felid Conference and was satisfied. It was more than I would normally spend but my zoo was footing the bill. The breakfast was great though I normally wouldn't have splurged for it but it was provided free to the conference attendees. The conference set up was good and the service was also fine. The location was far from the zoo and airport which made taxi fares a drag. Overall good experience considering this is not the usual type of hotel I stay at.
reviews.title: Good Place For A Short Conference

reviews.text: Recently in Omaha on business and stayed at this Marriott. It was a property that was built a while ago, but certainly well maintained. My room was decorated tastefully and modern. Bathroom was small, but chalk that up to the age of the property. The restaurant, food, and bar staff were all top notch. Compared to more modern Marriotts this as said is an older property. It can probably use a total renovation, but with what they have it is clean and well maintained.
reviews.title: Nice pleasant stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've been a Gold Marriott for many years and have stayed at properties all over the world. Stayed on first floor. Looks very similar to the last time I stayed here 12 years ago. Perhaps it has been updated, but the room I was in was tired looking. A/C heater grille was kicked in, many peices of candy on the carpet, ceiling stucco falling down, not what I would expect from a full service Marriott. Free internet worked well. Front desk clerk didn't seem too happy to see a customer checking in., however the check out staff were very pleasant. Breakfast was rather good, but the buffet was not open. Exercise area was being updated. Pretty average experience.
reviews.title: Property Needs Renovation

reviews.text: I have stayed at the Omaha Marriott several times on business and will definitely stay there again on my next trip.
reviews.title: Great Hotel to stay on Business

reviews.text: Hotel is clean, the staff is friendly and it is close to good restaurants and the mall.
reviews.title: Fairly Decent Property- 3 1/2 Stars

reviews.text: Nice staff and great location but hotel is VERY tired looking and could do with upgrading of rooms.
reviews.title: old property needs upgrading

reviews.text: Club floor is very average as well and could do with a revamp
reviews.title: Best Concierge Hostess (Rita)

reviews.text: I would recommend anyone to stop by and visit Rita at the Omaha Marriott concierge lounge. She is a pleasure to be around and the main reason I make the Omaha Marriott my hotel of choice when I visit the area.
reviews.title: No place else I'd rather stay when I'm in Omaha

reviews.text: I travel to Omaha approx. 8 times a year and out of all the Marrriott's I stay at in the mid and south west this is the best! From Michelle and Mark at the front desk who always go above and beyond to the smiles of Bryn, Kristen and Glen in the restaurant! Then there's Rita in concierge always happy always sweet always helpful always the best!! If these people were not there I would not stay they make my life and travel feel like home!!!
reviews.title: Good value, centrally located

reviews.text: Located off I-680 and Dodge St, so easy to access most anything in town. Nice room and comfy bed. Great workout facility and pool/hot tub. Starbucks coffee in the AM in lobby.
reviews.title: Excellent place to stay!
